sentences.en: It is well known that bamboo shoots are a panda's staple diet.
sentences.cn: 竹笋是熊猫的主要食物，这是人所共知的。

sentences.en: Many goods in China have the trademarks of a panda.
sentences.cn: 中国的许多商品都带有熊猫的商标.

sentences.en: No. If the panda  has not quit by morning .
sentences.cn: 不，如果明天早上那熊猫还不走

sentences.en: She has broken the panda to the show.
sentences.cn: 她训练那只熊猫惯于表演.

sentences.en: She trained her camera on the caged panda.
sentences.cn: 她把照相机对准笼子里的熊猫.

sentences.en: Some people used panda's fur to sleep on or to make fur coats.
sentences.cn: 一些人睡在熊猫皮上或用它作皮衣.

sentences.en: The caged panda chafed against the bars.
sentences.cn: 笼子里的大熊猫贴在栅栏上蹭它的身体。

sentences.en: The giant panda has become an endangered species.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫已成了一种濒临灭绝的动物.

sentences.en: The giant panda is an endangered species , ie is in danger of becoming extinct.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫是面临绝种危险的动物.

sentences.en: The giant panda is one of the surviving ancient animals.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫是一种残存的古动物。

sentences.en: The giant panda is one of the survivors of ancient animals.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫是一种残存的古动物.
那只熊猫吸引了不少孩子.

sentences.en: The panda is native to West China.
The panda's natural habitat is the bamboo forest.
sentences.cn: 大熊猫的天然栖息地是竹林。

sentences.en: The Wanglang Preserve in western Sichuan is the haunt of the giant panda.
sentences.cn: 川西的王朗自然保护区是大熊猫出没的地方.

sentences.en: Today, , I go to the zoo with my friends, I never see so many animals before, I see the panda, the giraffe and the monkey.
sentences.cn: 这天，我和朋友去动物园，我以前从来没看到那么多的动物，我看到了熊猫，长颈鹿和猴子。

sentences.en: Tourists come in droves to see the giant panda.
sentences.cn: 成群结队的游客前来观赏大熊猫.

sentences.en: We all see panda on TV or in the zoo.
sentences.cn: 我们在电视上或在动物园里能看到熊猫。

sentences.en: We had a panda as our mascot.
sentences.cn: 我们把熊猫作为吉详物.

trans.tran_en: a large black and white animal that looks like a bear and lives in the mountains of China
a large black and white animal that looks like a bear and lives in the mountains of China
